attributes.action: scrap the TV licence fee altogether in the light of proposals to spread the TV licence across other TV stations, and seek alternative funding.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The proposal to spread income from the TV Licence fee across other TV stations will further distort the market - firstly propping up non viable stations, secondly giving some stations unfair financial advantage and thirdly leading to a much higher fee as it includes more 'free to air' stations.
